lyrics.text:
Kuo tuku kia Sīsū
‘A e mālohi fulipē,
‘I he maama ‘i ‘olunga,
Mo māmani ‘i lalo ni.

Pea te ne fakahoko,
‘Ene pule angatonu,
Ki he fonua kotoa pē,
‘Oku ulo ai ‘a e la’ā.

’E fai ma’u pē ‘a e lotu,
‘I he huafa ‘o Sīsū,
Pea ‘e ongo lelei ia,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē.

‘E ‘alu hake ma’u ai pē,
‘A hono namu kakala;
‘O e huafa ‘o Sīsū,
‘I he pongipongi kotoa.

’E hiki mo e fānau si’i,
Honau le’o ‘i he hiva,
Pea hosana mālie,
Ki he ‘Eiki anga’ofa.

’Oku fai tapuekina,
‘A e kakai kotoa pē,
Kuo nau malava loto,
‘Ene pule angatonu.

Ko e pule tu’u ma’u ai pē,
Pea ‘e mafola atu,
Ki māmani kotoa pē,
‘E fai pē, ‘o ta’engata.
